name: iTech Quick Order
author: iTech Theme

sections.description:
You easily order from your dashboard for new customer & existing customers.

Features:
* Generate order from dashboard
* Create new customer account during generate new order
* Apply flat discount
* Detect existing customers

N.B: If you want more options in this plugin, please contact with us
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload itqo.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
